title: Cognitive Psychology
description: Exploration of the central aspects of human cognition including pattern recognition, attention, memory, language, categorization, problem solving, and decision making; phenomena and methods are stressed. Credit will not be awarded for both PSYC 4011 and PSYC 3011.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PSYC 2020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and PSYC 2015 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
